title: Talking of teeth
creator_credit: Fortune Film Productions and R.D. Hansen
brief_description: Examines the causes of dental decay, the effects of badly spaced teeth, the structure and care of teeth, and the value of visits to the dentist. Stresses the cultivation of the correct attitude to teeth care.
description: Examines the causes of dental decay, the effects of badly spaced teeth, the structure and care of teeth, and the value of visits to the dentist. Stresses the cultivation of the correct attitude to teeth care.
